data.title: Battle of the Network Stars Collection: Remastered Series
data.meta_description: complete episodes with color menus and the elusive episode 2. Shop with us today.
data.text:
EXCLUSIVE COMPLETE WITH THE MISSING #2 EPISODE!!! ONLY AVAILABLE AT 70s-TV.com

My Original transfers of the first 8 shows(excluding episode 2) have been copied and sold everywhere on the internet. Other sellers are still selling my old 8 disc collection. As the years passed and I purchased new equipment, I learned more about getting the most out of the VHS to DVD process. Curious to see how much I could improve these shows, I went back to the original tapes and made a new pass at it. I was very surprised and happy with the results. I also added some beautiful menus and Artwork. What I now have is the Best and Only one of its' kind. A further exclusive is the find of Episode #2 that now makes this set complete. It was rescued from an old beta tape and looks great.

BATTLE OF THE NETWORK STARS REMASTER

1976

1st episode (BEST in my opinion) aired on November 13, 1976.

Howard Cosell (Host) Gabriel Kaplan (ABC Team Captain) Darleen Carr

(ABC Team) Lynda Carter (ABC Team) Farrah Fawcett (ABC Team)

Richard Hatch (ABC Team) Robert Hegyes (ABC Team) Ron Howard (ABC

Team) Hal Linden (ABC Team) Penny Marshall (ABC Team) John Schuck

(ABC Team) Telly Savalas (CBS Team Captain) Adrienne Barbeau (CBS

Team) Gary Burghoff (CBS Team) Pat Harrington Jr. (CBS Team) Bill

Macy (CBS Team) Lee Meriwether (CBS Team) Mackenzie Phillips (CBS

Team) Loretta Swit (CBS Team) Jimmie Walker (CBS Team) Robert

Conrad (NBC Team Captain) Melissa Sue Anderson (NBC Team) Karen

Grassle (NBC Team) Tim Matheson (NBC Team) Ben Murphy (NBC Team)

Barbara Parkins (NBC Team) Joanna Pettet (NBC Team) Kevin Tighe

(NBC Team) Bobby Troupe (NBC Team) Demond Wilson (NBC Team). 100

minutes.

Episode 2 of the Battle of the Network Stars series has not been seen since the original airdate in 1977. This long lost show has now been rescued from a 35 year old BETA tape. While it is not perfect, we are excited to offer this Global Exclusive! Episode 2 aired February 28th, 1977. Howard Cosell (Host) Gabe Kaplan (ABC Team Captain) Levar Burton (ABC Team) Darleen Carr (ABC Team) Richard Hatch (ABC Team) Lawrence-Hilton Jacobs (ABC Team) Ron Howard (ABC Team) Hal Linden (ABC Team) Kristy McNichol (ABC Team) Penny Marshall (ABC Team) Jaclyn Smith (ABC Team) Telly Savalas (CBS Team Captain) Sonny Bono (CBS Team) Kevin Dobson (CBS Team) Mike Farrell (CBS Team) David Groh (CBS Team) Linda Lavin (CBS Team) Lee Meriwhether (CBS Team) Rob Reiner (CBS Team) Loretta Swit (CBS Team) Marcia Wallace (CBS Team) Robert Conrad (NBC Team Captain) Elizabeth Allen (NBC Team) Lynda Day George (NBC Team) Carl Franklin (NBC Team) Karen Grassle (NBC Team) Dan Haggerty (NBC Team) Art Hindle (NBC Team) Kurt Russell (NBC Team) Jane Seymour (NBC Team) W. K. Stratton (NBC Team). 93 minutes.
